title: v2.22.1, Apple Pencil Pro support and more
content:
Features:
  - Apple Pencil Pro squeeze gesture support (quick tool customization and quick color palette)
  - Layer panel can be docked to the sides

Enhancements:
  - Export settings will be saved for each file individually
  - Option to show export button on canvas
  - Frame navigation (buttons/swipe gesture) works with tags
  - Layer duplication keeps the layer name the same with -Copy suffix
  - Unlocked importing for free version

Fixes:
  - Text tool's color picker cannot input hex code
  - Layer's contextual shows on the first tap instead of the 2nd one
